content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1. I like reading and spending time on community activities. Do you have any hobbies?
I like walking dogs and playing games. I'm also trying to lose weight. What do you do for a living?
I'm a retail worker. I love my job, but it can be a bit stressful. What about you?
I'm a web designer. It's a lot of work, but I love it.
How long have you been working as a web designer?
I've been doing it for about 4 years now. It's a lot of fun and I love the challenge.
That's awesome! I'm trying to get into web design, but I'm still learning.
It's a lot of fun to learn and there's always something new to learn.
I love that it's always evolving and changing. I think it's really cool.
It's what makes it so exciting! I love the constant challenge.
I'm glad to hear that you love your job. It's important to love what you do.
It makes all the difference. I'm so glad that I found web design.
I'm glad that you found something that you love.
Thanks! I hope you find something that you love too.
I'm sure you will find it. You're smart and talented.
